name: The Light will lead you HOME
name_original: The Light will lead you HOME
description:
Summary:

Play as Brian, a teenage boy living with his parents. You wake up to find yourself trapped in your house with a horrible monster that only has one weakness: light. Can you get out?

A survival horror story-driven game.

Average Gameplay time: 1 hour

Controls:
W, S, D, A - Movement
Shift - Run
E/LMB -  Interact/Use Inventory
F - Flashlight
C - Crouch
I - Inventory
P/Esc - Pause Menu
RMB - Throw Object/Exit from Reading Letter
LMB - Drop Object

Features:

  • Roaming Monster: The monster in this game, patrols the common areas in the house: the kitchen and the corridor. It will hunt you down if you enter its territory without crouching. It will stop chasing you and move to your last known position, if you crouch or exit its territory.
  • One and only weakness: Monster's only weakness is light. Use your flashlight to defend yourself. The monster will die almost instantly and respawn. Beware, if you keep killing it, the light effect won't be effective immediately and the monster will try to kill you if it's attacked.
  • Story-driven: Unravel the mystery behind the monster that roams your house. Why are you trapped in your own house and what does the monster has to do with it? There is great symbolism in the game, so pay attention to the details. Be aware, the story has a sad and dark end!
  • Try to remain calm: As you play, you can break vases and plates. It's a good stress reliever while you are trapped in your house with a monster that's out to get you!
